Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ts1 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 4S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Santussi WM, Bordon KCF, Rodrigues Alves APN, Cologna CT, Said S, Arantes EC.2017
Literature.Title: Antifungal Activity against Filamentous Fungi of Ts1, a Multifunctional Toxin from Tityus serrulatus Scorpion Venom

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (61.54%) toBactridine 2C=G: 13%. GRAVY: -0.439, mol Wt: 6891.016; mol formula: C303H458N81O84S9; mol ex coeff: 24600.Activity: Inhibited the fungal growth of A. nidulans (MIC 2.1 uM).
